 Thanks Patriot.

You don't know how many messages I have got from civilians, and members of our police and military, thanking me for my contributions.  You have the same mentality many do with firearms: "But what if a criminal/terrorist obtains one?"  Following your logic further, we should also ban bookstores which sold books to bad people.  Hell, lets ban stairs, cars, ladders, and knives, do you have any idea how many people get killed with all of those?

In the time I have began uploading torrents, I have had at least one million downloads to people, where nothing has went wrong.  Who knows, maybe someday in the future an idiot will use my books for something bad, but that is the price I am willing to pay to educate tens (or hundreds) of thousands more.  Even if a few bad apples download my material, a 99.999% success rate is good enough for me.  I go to bed every night knowing I made a difference, and nothing will ever change that.

And besides, how often do babies/mothers/children drive tanks or fly military aircraft? :)

I do wish to add to DTOMs comment and say that no matter what some lunatic is going to do harm in one way or another.  Big saying here in America, shit happens.  When it does it's up to the person facing it to deal with it.  Also I'm sure a couple mothers drive tanks in Iraq or something but lets face it, they joined the military knowing the risks.  Also you're more likely to fall down stairs than get shot, let alone blown to hell by a terrorist.
Ah, right thank you for the uploads DTOM.

The things I release are not some top secret manuals I stole from an underground vault.  All of these are rips of material you could buy at online book or DVD selling websites.  If a bad person has the will to make poison gas, an IED, or a GPS scrambler, learn snipping techniques (taken from your message), what makes you think they wouldn't have the will power to spend $20 on the book, or use google (which is what I used to find a fair amount of my content).

Regardless of your fears, once I find/create a tracker to resume uploading on, I will resume my duties immediately, so you better learn to start coping.  I am not trying to stop you from complaining, everyone has the right to speak their mind, all I am saying is you are having no impact on what I am doing, that is all.  It is quite clear you have a lack of perspective on the issue.  And quite frankly, I could care less if you would be worried if you uploaded anything.

Please, just save yourself the time and stop arguing with me.  You are not going to change my mind, and you are not going to find many people here who will side with you.  Here, type in "gun forum," and feel free to go over and and terrorists as well, I am sure they would enjoy you there.

I know I am wasting my time talking to you, I don't know why I spent the last few minutes doing so...

Here is to a million more downloads, I dedicate them to melly2222.
Don't worry Melly. I'm sure law enforcement agency are way advanced than us (and those little kiddies who want to be Rambo or Solid Snake).
I mean agencies.
He makes a good point.  Every LE agency nationwide can afford gunships, spy drones, thermal vision, and Death Stars.

You dont have to worry about small time torrents making it into the hands of terrorists out there, (no offense DTOM, and thanks much for the uploads!)  What you should lose sleep at night over is these terrorist organizations ability to gain access to full-blown US military aviation, urban warfare, and demolition manuals.  You know, the ones that have been FOUND, IN ORIGINAL PRINT, INSIDE terrorist hide outs?  That is what should paralyze you with a combination of fear, and the shits.

The only terrorists are the governments who are fighting desperately to retain the power and control that they have.  No loss of life is too great to retain their illusion of control.
The only protection you have from 'the powers that be' is belief in Christ and your ability to circumvent the methods used by your governments to silence (permanently with extreme prejudice) and control the population.
If you don't know how they operate, how can you protect yourself?

Don't believe everything you see on TV, the more studying you do on 9/11 and terrorism, you may be surprised to find that the real terrorists are already "dug in deeper than an Alabama tick" (hunkered down).  You CANNOT remove or harm the governments, only Christ with his angels can do that.  You're only chance for prevailing on this 'physical' realm is accumulation of knowledge for defense, not attack.

What is "The Beast" and who is the "False Prophet".  Questions that shall soon be answered.  Do your homework.

JER 29:19 Because they have not hearkened to my words, saith the LORD, which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending [them]; but ye would not hear, saith the LORD.

ECC 1:18 For in much wisdom [is] much grief: and he that increaseth knowledge increaseth sorrow.

May God bless and keep all of you in the times to come.
